00023 #ifndef __NITF_BUFFERED_WRITER_HPP__
00024 #define __NITF_BUFFERED_WRITER_HPP__
00025 
00026 #include "nitf/NITFException.hpp"
00027 #include "nitf/System.hpp"
00028 #include "nitf/IOInterface.hpp"
00029 #include "nitf/IOHandle.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace nitf
00032 {
00033 
00034 class BufferedWriter : public IOInterface
00035 {
00036 
00037 private:
00038     nitf::Off mBufferSize;
00039     bool mOwn;
00040     char *mBuffer;
00041     nitf::Off mPosition;
00042     nitf::Off mTotalWritten;
00043     nitf::Off mBlocksWritten;
00044     nitf::Off mPartialBlocks;
00045     nitf::IOHandle mIOHandle;
00046 public:
00047 
00048     BufferedWriter(std::string file, nitf::Off bufferSize) 
00049         throw(nitf::NITFException)
00050         : mBufferSize(bufferSize), mOwn(true), mPosition(0), 
00051           mTotalWritten(0), mBlocksWritten(0), mPartialBlocks(0)
00052     {
00053         mIOHandle.create(file, NITF_ACCESS_WRITEONLY, NITF_CREATE);
00054         mBuffer = new char[bufferSize];
00055         if (!mBuffer)
00056             throw nitf::NITFException(Ctxt("Out of memory"));
00057     }
00058 
00059     BufferedWriter(std::string file, char *buffer, 
00060                nitf::Off size, bool adopt = false) 
00061         throw(nitf::NITFException)
00062             : mBufferSize(size), mOwn(adopt), 
00063               mBuffer(buffer), mPosition(0), 
00064               mTotalWritten(0), mBlocksWritten(0), mPartialBlocks(0)
00065     {
00066         mIOHandle.create(file, NITF_ACCESS_WRITEONLY, NITF_CREATE);
00067     }
00068 
00069     ~BufferedWriter();
00070 
00071     virtual void flushBuffer();
00072 
00073     virtual void read(char * buf, size_t size);
00074 
00075     virtual void write(const char * buf, size_t size) 
00076         throw(nitf::NITFException);
00077 
00078     virtual nitf::Off seek(nitf::Off offset, int whence) 
00079         throw(nitf::NITFException);
00080 
00081     virtual nitf::Off tell() throw(nitf::NITFException);
00082 
00083     virtual nitf::Off getSize() throw(nitf::NITFException);
00084 
00085     virtual void close();
00086 
00087     virtual nitf::Off getTotalWritten()
00088     {
00089         return mTotalWritten;
00090     }
00091     virtual nitf::Off getNumBlocksWritten()
00092     {
00093         return mBlocksWritten;
00094     }
00095 
00096     virtual nitf::Off getNumPartialBlocksWritten()
00097     {
00098         return mPartialBlocks;
00099     }
00100 
00101 
00102 };
00103 
00104 }
00105 #endif
